values.title: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
values.desc: Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not and often times we call a man cold when he is only sad

values.title: Ned Vizzini
values.desc: I didnt want to wake up I was having a much better time asleep And thats really sad It was almost like a reverse nightmare like when you wake up from a nightmare youre so relieved I woke up into a nightmare

values.title: Laurell K Hamilton
values.desc: There are wounds that never show on the body that are deeper and more hurtful than anything that bleeds

values.title: John Green
values.desc: Whenever you read a cancer booklet or website or whatever they always list depression among the side effects of cancer But in fact depression is not a side effect of cancer Depression is a side effect of dying

values.title: Ned Vizzini
values.desc: I cant eat and I cant sleep Im not doing well in terms of being a functional human you know

values.title: John Keats
values.desc: Do you not see how necessary a world of pains and troubles is to school an intelligence and make it a soul

values.title: Barbara Kingsolver
values.desc: There is no point treating a depressed person as though she were just feeling sad saying There now hang on youll get over it Sadness is more or less like a head cold with patience it passes Depression is like cancer

values.title: Fiona Apple
values.desc: When youre surrounded by all these people it can be lonelier than when youre by yourself You can be in a huge crowd but if you dont feel like you can trust anyone or talk to anybody you feel like youre really alone

values.title: Dodie Smith
values.desc: Noble deeds and hot baths are the best cures for depression

values.title: Elizabeth Wurtzel
values.desc: That is all I want in life for this pain to seem purposeful

values.title: Ned Vizzini
values.desc: I waste at least an hour every day lying in bed Then I waste time pacing I waste time thinking I waste time being quiet and not saying anything because Im afraid Ill stutter

values.title: Sylvia Plath
values.desc: because wherever I saton the deck of a ship or at a street caf in Paris or BangkokI would be sitting under the same glass bell jar stewing in my own sour air

values.title: Andrew Solomon
values.desc: I believe that words are strong that they can overwhelm what we fear when fear seems more awful than life is good

values.title: Henry Rollins
values.desc: Ill never forget how the depression and loneliness felt good and bad at the same time Still does
